2fa.dashboard_desc_enabled: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account
2fa.dashboard_desc_disabled: You do not currently have two-factor authentication enabled on your account. Click the button below to begin configuring it.
2fa.disable_password_desc: You must provide your current password in order to continue.

setup.input_desc: Enter the code from your authenticator device after scanning the QR image.
setup.enabled_desc: Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. Should you lose access to your authenticator device, you'll need to use one of the codes displayed below in order to access your account.
setup.store_securely: <bold>These codes will not be displayed again.</bold> Please take note of them now by storing them in a secure repository such as a password manager.

validation.code_required: You must provide an authentication code to continue.

2fa_required_desc: Your account must have two-factor authentication enabled in order to continue.
allowed_ips_text: Leave blank to allow any IP address to use this API key, otherwise provide each IP address on a new line.
delete_api_key_text: Are you sure you wish to delete this API key? All requests using it will immediately be invalidated and will fail.
description_text: A description of this API key.
email_updated: Your Email Address has been updated.
need_authentication_code: You must provide an authentication code to continue.
need_current_password: You must provide your current password in order to continue.
new_api_key_desc: The API key you have requested is shown below. Please store this in a safe location, it will not be shown again.
new_password_description: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length and unique to this website.
no_api_keys_exist: No API keys exist for this account.
no_servers_admin: There are no other servers to display.
no_servers_self: There are no servers associated with your account.
password_confirmation_not_match: Password confirmation does not match the password you entered.
search_description: Enter a server name, uuid, or allocation to begin searching.
search_min_characters: Please enter at least three characters to begin searching.
